small_ring.description: A lucky ring that slightly increases critical hit chance.

bronze_dagger.name: Bronze Dagger
bronze_dagger.description: A sharp bronze dagger that deals moderate damage.

cloth_armor.name: Cloth Armor
cloth_armor.description: Light armor that provides minimal protection.
